messages.title: Don't let the Tory/Lib Dem Government rob people of their right to register to vote.
messages.content: Labour is campaigning to get as many people as possible to sign up by calling 020 8356 3232.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will build 200,000 homes a year.
Labour is promising 25 hours of free childcare for working parents with 3 & 4-year-olds.
Labour will guarantee jobs for all unemployed under 25.

issues.economy: The Tories' plan is failing working people and will continue to create a growing divide between rich and poor.
issues.education: Labour will guarantee jobs for all unemployed under 25.

housing.content: Labour will build 200,000 homes a year.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud of my record in this area and will continue to stand up for you in Parliament.

politicalExperience.achievements: Proud of the record in standing up for the constituents.
